creator: horvatinbridgit@johndeere.com
text:
I have set up Tomcat and Apache to use mod_jk.conf.  However when I try to 
start the apache service I get a server-specific error code 1.  I am running 
apache 2.0.35, Tomcat 3.3.3 and JDK 1.4.0.  The server is Windows 2000 SP2.  
Both applications will run independently but if I add the include statement in 
http.conf the service will not start.

creator: dbeutner@acg-gmbh.de
text: Look at http://www.acg-gmbh.de/mod_jk for this topic!

There is too few information to be usefull.
I close the bug for now
creator: hgomez@slib.fr
